# Visual Testing Templates

> Ready-to-use templates for visual design testing methods

---

## 5-Second Test Template

### Preparation
- [ ] Screen/design selected
- [ ] 3-5 follow-up questions prepared
- [ ] 5-15 participants recruited

### Questions (After 5-Second Exposure)
1. "What do you remember seeing?"
2. "What do you think this company does?"
3. "What three words describe what you saw?"
4. "What stood out most?"
5. "Would you trust this company?"

### Staylook Questions
- "What caught your eye first?" (One Highlight)
- "Did it feel warm/friendly or cold?"

---

## First-Click Test Template

### Task Format
| Task | Prompt | Expected Area |
|------|--------|---------------|
| 1 | "Where would you click to..." | [Area] |

### Results
| Participant | Task 1 | Task 2 | Task 3 |
|-------------|--------|--------|--------|
| P1 | ✅/❌ | ✅/❌ | ✅/❌ |

---

## Preference Test Template

### Questions
1. "Which design do you prefer? Why?"
2. "Which feels more [trustworthy/professional]?"
3. "What influenced your choice?"

### Results
| Participant | Preferred | Reason |
|-------------|-----------|--------|
| P1 | A / B | |

---

## Closed Word Choice (Desirability)

### Staylook Word List (30 words)

**Target**: Premium, Curved, Minimal, Expressive, Friendly, Trustworthy, Editorial, Refined

**Opposite**: Cheap, Sharp, Cluttered, Boring, Cold, Suspicious, Messy, Rough

**Distractor**: Professional, Modern, Corporate, Functional, Elegant, Simple, Traditional, Bold, Clean, Sophisticated, Polished, Approachable, Innovative, Playful

### Instructions
> "Choose 3-5 words that best describe this design."

---

## Rating Scale Template

Rate 1-5:
- Cheap ←→ Premium
- Sharp ←→ Curved
- Cluttered ←→ Minimal
- Boring ←→ Expressive
- Cold ←→ Friendly
- Amateur ←→ Professional
- Confusing ←→ Clear

---

## Sample Sizes

| Method | Min | Recommended |
|--------|-----|-------------|
| 5-Second | 5 | 10-15/design |
| First-Click | 5 | 10-15/design |
| Preference | 8 | 12-15 total |
| Word Choice | 8 | 15-20/design |
| Rating Scales | 15 | 30+ |
